overview: ‘It’s Coming’ and you better be ready for thrilling, intense, hardcore action. Sometimes when bad things happen, that darkness rips a hole from this world into the next blurring the lines of reality. After unsolved murders occur in an old house, a group of friends dare each other to spend the night there. The curse of the murder house continues as the body count piles up. Even a slick makeover from a daring real estate agent isn't enough to break the curse.
title: It's Coming
